attributes.title: Kept crashing

attributes.title: Wow

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️✨💛
attributes.review: Holy heck this app is horrible. It’s propaganda. I’m not even sure I should be writing this comment because I don’t want something to happen as a result. Bad app sad I can’t rate 0/10

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️🦋✨
attributes.review: this app took a WEEK to download! then after finally downloading it literally called me ugly and deleted all my info on my phone!!!! had to get a new phone!!

attributes.title: Don’t get this app!
attributes.review: This app is terrifying! I Recommend that you don’t get this app, because it harms your brain! The flashy colors are too much to handle, for anyone! Don’t get the app

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: First of all, this took 7 hours to download and i have horse power solar awesome wifi. Then when i finally opened the app, i saw this weird orange man holding up a fist? Although, he does not support BLM or women’s rights👁👄👁. WORST APP EVER❤️.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This has to be the worst app I have ever installed. It takes hours to download, and once you download it it is super buggy. If anything this convinced me not to vote for trump!

attributes.title: Does not work!! Glitchy!
attributes.review: This app has so many issues and when I opened it I did not expect to find so much racist content!!

attributes.title: Don’t download 😤
attributes.review:
I am upset that it took more than one day to download and at first I was pleased but 
Realized it was racist and straight up rude. This shouldn’t have been uploaded to the App Store.

attributes.title: hope i helped 😉
